intro_card_heading: Welcome to DotAI YouTube to IG Caption Generator!
intro_card_purpose: This application helps you generate engaging Instagram captions and transcripts from YouTube videos using AI.
intro_card_usage_step1: 1. Paste a YouTube video URL below.
intro_card_usage_step2: 2. Click "Generate Transcript" to get the video text.
intro_card_usage_step3: 3. (Optional) Download the transcript as a .txt or .srt file.
intro_card_usage_step4: 4. Select your desired language and style, then click "Generate Captions".
intro_card_usage_step5: 5. Choose your favorite caption from the generated options and copy it!
